name: simple-tiling-gnome-plugin
description: Simple automatic tiling window manager for GNOME Shell using binary space partitioning

scripts.install: mkdir -p ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simple-tiling@tubbe && cp -r extension.js tilingManager.js treeNode.js metadata.json ~/.local/share/gnome-shell/extensions/simple-tiling@tubbe/
